resources.string:
Hisnul Muslim is a collection of supplications for various occasions compiled by Dr. Sa\'eed bin Ali bin Wahaf Al-Qahtani. The author is from amongst the senior students of the former Grand Mufti of Saudi Arabia, Shaykh Abdul Aziz bin Abdullah bin Baz (May Allah have mercy on him).

المساهمين

Hussaini Zulkifli (@HussainiZul)
